title: Scotch Brand Precision Ultra Edge Scissors, 8 Inch, 3-Pack (1458-3AMZ-ESF)
description: Scotch Precision Ultra Edge Scissors deliver superior cutting for all your tasks. Ideal for fabric cutting, crafts, photos, school projects, office and home use. Titanium fused blades stay sharp beyond 100,000 cuts, lasting longer than stainless steel blades. Convenient non-stick coating resists sticky residue for clean use on a variety of materials. The soft comfort grip handle is designed for comfortable left- or right-handed use.
